name: Blood Feud
description:
In Blood Feud you aim to reconquer your rightful place as Margrave of the Empire, after Count Sigismund von Hildenfurt killed your grandfather. Your family started a Feud with the usurper, and tried to kill him many a time. The assaults were never successful though, as the Count, discovering forgotten tomes in your castle, gained the ability to summon armoured husks.

This is my first game. I made it during Unity Learn's Summer 2020 Create with Code course. I am really grateful to the mods team, Carl Domingo and Thomas Winkley for providing me and many others a great opportunity to delve into game developing.
